channel.title: hugo on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Hugo Setup
item.description: 我是在ubuntu上搭建hugo博客的 1.首先，安装hugo。 1 sudo apt install hugo 1 hugo new site newblog 1 2 3 4 5 cd newblog git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke echo 'theme = "ananke"' >> config.toml # 或者，编辑confi
